title: Specifically, this service will proactively disclose "imminent harm" information to legal authorities

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Article 10, third section "SECURITY" "Iron Horse will release personal or general information without your consent for security purposes, when required by law, or to prevent imminent harm to any person or entity. ... based on a determination made solely by us, exercising our own discretion, permission for which is expressly granted by you to us in accordance with this Policy."
